entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -22.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 4:50 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -22.6°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -25.2°C
Wind: NW 39 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then a few clouds. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
